# replaceLayoutManager(_:)

**Instance Method**

Replaces the layout manager for the group of text system objects that contains the text container.

## Declaration

```swift
func replaceLayoutManager(_ newLayoutManager: NSLayoutManager)
```

## Parameters

- **newLayoutManager**: The new layout manager.

## Discussion

The framework reassigns all text containers and text views attached to the old layout manager to the new layout manager. Unlike setting the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextContainer/layoutManager] property directly, this method makes all the adjustments necessary to keep the text object relationships intact.

## Managing text components

- **layoutManager**: The text container’s layout manager.
- **textLayoutManager**
- **textView**: The text container’s text view.
